about.title: We support you in achieving your projects!
about.intro: At Afira, we believe that financial inclusion is a powerful lever to transform lives and build a sustainable future. Our mission is to democratize access to financial services and economic education, especially for those whom traditional systems often leave out: women and informal workers. We combine mobile technology, flexible nanotechnology and accessible educational content to offer everyone the concrete tools towards financial autonomy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every young woman entrepreneur, every informal worker can access the resources needed to realize their ideas, escape precariousness, and become an actor in their future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Access is not enough. True inclusion means creating solutions for those who are systematically forgotten: women, rural populations, low-income communities. We develop inclusive digital services that are: Affordable, Easy to use, even with low digital literacy, Available in local languages, Relevant to daily needs. This is not a network issue. It's a human issue.

whyAfira.title: Why Afira
whyAfira.description: Mobile connectivity is now an essential driver of digital transformation and socio-economic growth in Sub-Saharan Africa. According to the GSMA Mobile Economy 2024 report: 'Mobile technology contributes to SDG 4, which aims to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities.' 'Digital transformation makes educational resources more accessible, improves learning outcomes, and supports continuous learning.' We build on these findings to design a platform that strengthens community capabilities and generates lasting impact.

contact.title: We support you in achieving your projects!
contact.intro: At AFIRA, we believe that every vendor, delivery person and farmer deserves a chance to develop their business, even without access to banks.

vision.title: Our Mission
vision.description:
is simple:
Make financing accessible, fast and transparent for these informal workers, while giving them the tools to better manage their money and strengthen their financial autonomy.
We know that traditional microfinance is often expensive, complex and poorly adapted to the real needs of small businesses. Result: millions of women and young people remain excluded from the financial system, prisoners of abusive informal loans.At AFIRA, we offer:
Instant micro-loans (nanofinance): Amounts adapted to reality unlocked via a mobile money account.
A simple, stress-free approach: No hidden fees, no papers, no endless meetings.
Integrated financial education: Each loan comes with a practical mini-educational module to better manage your income.
Positive incentives: Loyalty rewarded, gamification and support to grow together.

mission.title: Our Ambition?
mission.description: Build the first inclusive nanofinance and financial education platform in West Africa, starting with Senegal, to give thousands of women and young entrepreneurs the means to succeed, one loan at a time.
